languages.text: "А еще эта, как ее, Тласс которая. Леди Теодора ее с собой таскала везде — и чем дело кончилось? Вот не удивлюсь ни разу, если эта ведьма ее сгубила — как и кучу народу до того. Вообще не понимаю, как эту ходячую беду на борту держать можно. Хотя не все так думают... вон, говорят, с младшей Толиман они подружки. Были, по крайней мере".

"Then there's that woman, what's her name? Tlass? Lady Theodora brought her along wherever she went, and look what happened to her? I wouldn't be surprised if it turns out it was that witch that delivered her to an early grave, just like countless souls before. I don't see why anyone would want that walking calamity on their ship, but some would disagree... They say she's friends with young Toliman, you know. Or at least, she used to be."
languages.original_text: "А еще эта, как ее, Тласс которая. Леди Теодора ее с собой таскала везде — и чем дело кончилось? Вот не удивлюсь ни разу, если эта ведьма ее сгубила — как и кучу народу до того. Вообще не понимаю, как эту ходячую беду на борту держать можно. Хотя не все так думают... вон, говорят, с младшей Толиман они подружки. Были, по крайней мере".

traits.locale_text: "Then there is that woman, what is her name? Tlass? Lady Theodora brought her along wherever she went, and what happened to her? I wouldn't be surprised if it turns out it was the witch that brought her to an early grave, just like countless souls before. I do not understand why anyone would want that walking calamity on their ship, though some disagree... They are friends with young Toliman, you know. Or at least used to be."

I wouldn't be surprised if it turns out it was the witch that brought her to an early grave, just like countless souls before. I do not understand why anyone would want that walking calamity on their ship, though some disagree... They are friends with young Toliman, you know. Or at least used to be."

I don't see why anyone would want that walking calamity on their ship, but some would disagree... They say she's friends with young Toliman, you know. Or at least, she used to be."

I wouldn't be surprised if it turns out it was that witch that delivered her to an early grave, just like countless souls before. I don't see why anyone would want that walking calamity on their ship, but some would disagree... They say she's friends with young Toliman, you know. Or at least, she used to be."

languages.text: “还有那个姑娘，她叫什么来着？特拉斯？西奥多拉夫人无论走到哪里都会带着她，无论她遇到什么事情都会介意，对吧？那个女巫害死了不少人。万一西奥多拉夫人也是她害死的，我也不意外。我不明白，怎么会有人愿意让那个灾星留在船上，不过肯定有人不同意我的看法……大家都说，她是小托里曼的朋友，或者说，至少以前她们是朋友。”
languages.original_text: "Then there's that woman, what's her name? Tlass? Lady Theodora brought her along wherever she went, and look what happened to her? I wouldn't be surprised if it turns out it was that witch that delivered her to an early grave, just like countless souls before. I don't see why anyone would want that walking calamity on their ship, but some would disagree... They say she's friends with young Toliman, you know. Or at least, she used to be."

traits.locale_text: “还有那个姑娘，她叫什么来着？特拉斯？西奥多拉夫人无论走到哪里都会带着她，无论她遇到什么事情都会介意，对吧？那个女巫害死了不少人。万一西奥多拉夫人也是她害死的，我也不意外。我不明白，怎么会有人愿意让那个灾星留在船上，不过肯定有人不同意我的看法……大家都说，她是小托里曼的朋友，或者说，至少以前她们是朋友。”

languages.text: «Después tenemos a esa mujer, ¿cómo se llamaba? ¿Tlass? Lady Theodora la llevaba consigo a todas partes, ¡y así acabó! No me sorprendería que esa bruja la hubiera conducido a una muerte temprana igual que a muchas otras almas. No veo por qué alguien querría a semejante calamidad a bordo de la nave, pero hay quien no está de acuerdo... Dicen que es amiga de la joven Toliman, ¿sabe? O por lo menos, que lo era».
languages.original_text: "Then there's that woman, what's her name? Tlass? Lady Theodora brought her along wherever she went, and look what happened to her? I wouldn't be surprised if it turns out it was that witch that delivered her to an early grave, just like countless souls before. I don't see why anyone would want that walking calamity on their ship, but some would disagree... They say she's friends with young Toliman, you know. Or at least, she used to be."

traits.locale_text: «Después tenemos a esa mujer, ¿cómo se llamaba? ¿Tlass? Lady Theodora la llevaba consigo a todas partes, ¡y así acabó! No me sorprendería que esa bruja la hubiera conducido a una muerte temprana igual que a muchas otras almas. No veo por qué alguien querría a semejante calamidad a bordo de la nave, pero hay quien no está de acuerdo... Dicen que es amiga de la joven Toliman, ¿sabe? O por lo menos, que lo era».

languages.text: 「それから、あの女性、名前は何といいましたか？トラス？シオドーラ様が常に帯同させていた。それでどうなったでしょうか？あの魔女めのせいで彼女が早死にしたしても驚きはしませんね。これまで、数え切れないほどの魂が同じような目にあってきたのですから。あのような歩く災難のような人物を船に置いておきたい思う者がいるとは思えませんが、そでない者もいるようで…彼女はトリマンの友人だそうですね。少なくとも、かつてはそうだった、と」
languages.original_text: "Then there's that woman, what's her name? Tlass? Lady Theodora brought her along wherever she went, and look what happened to her? I wouldn't be surprised if it turns out it was that witch that delivered her to an early grave, just like countless souls before. I don't see why anyone would want that walking calamity on their ship, but some would disagree... They say she's friends with young Toliman, you know. Or at least, she used to be."

traits.locale_text: 「それから、あの女性、名前は何といいましたか？トラス？テオドラ様が連れて行ったがどうなったのでしょうか？あの魔女が彼女を早死にさせたとわかっても驚きはしませんね。これまで、数え切れないほどの魂が同じような目にあってきたのですから。あんな歩く災難を船に乗せたいと思う人がいるとは思えませんが、そうは思わない人もいるようで…彼女はトリマンの友人だと言われているようですね。少なくとも、かつてはそうだった、と」

languages.text: "Dann ist da noch diese Frau. Wie heißt sie noch gleich? Tlass? Sie war ständig an Lady Theodoras Seite, egal, wohin sie ging, und Ihr seht ja, was sie davon hatte. Es würde mich nicht wundern, wenn sie diese Hexe ins Jenseits befördert hätte ... so wie zahllose Seelen vor ihr. Ich verstehe ja nicht, warum jemand dieses wandelnde Unheil auf seinem Schiff haben will, aber das sehen nicht alle so ... Angeblich ist sie mit der jungen Toliman befreundet. Oder war es zumindest."
languages.original_text: "Then there's that woman, what's her name? Tlass? Lady Theodora brought her along wherever she went, and look what happened to her? I wouldn't be surprised if it turns out it was that witch that delivered her to an early grave, just like countless souls before. I don't see why anyone would want that walking calamity on their ship, but some would disagree... They say she's friends with young Toliman, you know. Or at least, she used to be."

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist da noch diese Frau. Wie heißt sie noch gleich? Tlass? Sie war ständig an Lady Theodoras Seite, egal, wohin sie ging, und Ihr seht ja, was sie davon hatte. Es würde mich nicht wundern, wenn sie diese Hexe ins Jenseits befördert hätte ... so wie zahllose Seelen vor ihr. Ich verstehe ja nicht, warum jemand dieses wandelnde Unheil auf seinem Schiff haben will, aber das sehen nicht alle so ... Angeblich ist sie mit der jungen Toliman befreundet. Oder war es zumindest."

languages.text: « Et il y a cette femme, là. Comment s'appelle-t-elle ? Tlass ? Elle accompagnait dame Théodora en toute circonstance et voyez ce qu'il lui est arrivé. Je ne serais pas surpris que sa mort prématurée soit l'œuvre de cette sorcière qui a envoyé au tombeau bien d'autres âmes imprudentes avant elle. Je ne comprendrai jamais la présence de cette calamité ambulante à bord d'un vaisseau, mais tous ne sont pas de cet avis... On dit par exemple qu'elle est amie avec la jeune Toliman. Ou du moins, elle l'était. »
languages.original_text: "Then there's that woman, what's her name? Tlass? Lady Theodora brought her along wherever she went, and look what happened to her? I wouldn't be surprised if it turns out it was that witch that delivered her to an early grave, just like countless souls before. I don't see why anyone would want that walking calamity on their ship, but some would disagree... They say she's friends with young Toliman, you know. Or at least, she used to be."

traits.locale_text: « Et il y a cette femme, là. Comment s'appelle-t-elle ? Tlass ? Elle accompagnait dame Théodora en toute circonstance et voyez ce qu'il lui est arrivé. Je ne serais pas surpris que sa mort prématurée soit l'œuvre de cette sorcière qui a envoyé au tombeau bien d'autres âmes imprudentes avant elle. Je ne comprendrai jamais la présence de cette calamité ambulante à bord d'un vaisseau, mais tous ne sont pas de cet avis... On dit par exemple qu'elle est amie avec la jeune Toliman. Ou du moins, elle l'était. »

languages.text: "Bir de şu kadın var, neydi adı? Tlass mıydı? Leydi Theodora gittiği her yere onu götürürdü, sonra bakın ne oldu. Nice zavallı gibi Leydi Theodora'yı da erkenden mezara götüren, o cadı çıksa hiç şaşırmazdım. Kim neden öyle bir ayaklı musibeti gemisinde tutmak ister, anlamam ama benimle hemfikir olmayanlar da var işte. Hatun, genç Toliman'la arkadaşmış, diyorlar. En azından eskiden."
languages.original_text: "Then there's that woman, what's her name? Tlass? Lady Theodora brought her along wherever she went, and look what happened to her? I wouldn't be surprised if it turns out it was that witch that delivered her to an early grave, just like countless souls before. I don't see why anyone would want that walking calamity on their ship, but some would disagree... They say she's friends with young Toliman, you know. Or at least, she used to be."

Kim neden öyle bir ayaklı musibeti gemisinde tutmak ister, anlamam ama benimle hemfikir olmayanlar da var işte. Hatun, genç Toliman'la arkadaşmış, diyorlar. En azından eskiden."
